mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, reason, content, mobile, waybill_id, shipper_id, transporter_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, attachment_id_4, shipper_company_id, transporter_company_id, order_id, order_no
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.reason,a.content,a.mobile, a.order_no as orderNo, b.mobile,b.surname.b.name, c.mobile as shipperMobile, e.name as shipperCompanyName from t_transporter_complaint a left join t_user b on a.transporter_id = b.id left join t_user c on a.shipper_id = c.id left join t_company e on a.shipper_company_id = e.id where 1=1
and a.order_no like concat('%',#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and b.mobile like concat('%',#{transporterMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and c.mobile like concat('%',#{shipperMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and e.name like concat('%',#{shipperCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.reason,a.content,a.mobile, a.order_no as orderNo, b.mobile,b.surname.b.name, c.mobile as shipperMobile, e.name as shipperCompanyName from t_transporter_complaint a left join t_user b on a.transporter_id = b.id left join t_user c on a.shipper_id = c.id left join t_company e on a.shipper_company_id = e.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_transporter_complaint (id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, reason, content, mobile, waybill_id, shipper_id, transporter_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, attachment_id_4, shipper_company_id, transporter_company_id, order_id, order_no) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipperCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_transporter_complaint set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, waybill_id = #{waybillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper_id = #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transporter_id = #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_1 = #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_2 = #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_3 = #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_4 = #{attachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper_company_id = #{shipperCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transporter_company_id = #{transporterCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
